entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Chetwynd
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:42 AM MST Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chetwynd Airport 08:00 AM MST Sunday 08 May 2016
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 1.1°C
Wind: SW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this morning and ending this afternoon then 60 percent chance of showers later this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this morning. High 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 08 May 2016
